resources.string: Limited zoom (double precision), pan and zoom by swiping and pinching, Julia mode.
Unlimited zoom (arbitrary precision using GMP), GPU accelerated, tap to zoom only, no panning, no Julia mode.

Please grant write permissions to save the image.

- Hold and drag to move
- Pinch to zoom in/out
- Press the Settings button or Volume up/down to change iterations
- Press the Julia Mode button to enable the Julia window. Drag and zoom within the Julia or Mandelbrot windows to explore.
